snippet: A previously undisclosed launching site and space center could theoretically be used for testing ballistic missiles, according to a report.
abstract: London-based weapons research publication IHS Jane's reports that Iran has built  previously undisclosed launching site and space center near northeastern city of Shahrud that could be used for testing ballistic missiles.
lead_paragraph: A previously undisclosed launching site and space center could theoretically be used for testing ballistic missiles, according to a report.

headline.main: Launching Site in Iran Raises Missile Worries
headline.print_headline: Launching Site In Iran Raises Missile Worries
